page.title: 02Seventy Years in Drayton (1)
page.content: Beatrice,born 5th of April, 1916. I was born at East Street,Drayton and attended Drayton School from 3 to 11 years of age. I then went to Curry Rivel School until I was l4. My first job was as kitchen maid at Burton Pynsent. I lived in and wages were five shillings a week . I had one half day off on Wednesdays and every other Sunday. I had to be back indoors by nine o'clock. I worked there for three years, then had two other 'in service ' jobs before marrying. I did morning cleaning jobs until the children came. I married Reg. on the 4th of February,1939. We lived, at first, with my husband's people, then we rented our present home in January, l940. for a rent of five shillings a week.
